label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_014
content:
## 2024-09-15 Daily Operations Summary

- Unique Source IPs: 1927
- Unique Destination IPs: 5735

- Top Protocol TCP Percentage: 79.4
- Top Protocol UDP Percentage: 15.0
- ICMP Percentage: 1.6
- Long Lived Flows Greater Than 1 Hour: 55
- East-West Traffic Percentage: 58.6

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total Queries: 3746284
- Unique Domains: 59927
- NXDomain Responses: 13044
- DGA Suspected Domains: 5
- DNS Over HTTPS Queries: 4662
- Average Response Time (ms): 3.9
- Cache Hit Percentage: 87.0
- TXT Record Queries: 342
- PTR Queries: 6242

### Ids Ips Hits

  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
- False Positive Rate Percentage: 17.6

### Events
- NetFlow anomaly: uncommon protocol from 10.46.178.47 — investigated, benign
- IPS blocked 49 packets from 198.51.221.198: brute force
- Bandwidth: DMZ utilization at 80.9% capacity — monitoring

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-15. 14754775 flows analyzed. 3746284 DNS queries. 769 IDS alerts (3 critical, 18 high). WAN avg 3.48/1.72 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
